**What happened**:

I'm trying to query the API server and am getting unexpected results like `Forbidden: "/apis"` when not providing (enough) credentials.

**What you expected to happen**:

According to https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#http-status-codes I expected the server to return a Status object with status = 'Failure' and code = 403/401.

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):

`curl -k API-SERVER-URL/apis`

**Anything else we need to know**:

I'm writing a client library, and want to handle errors properly, so any additional help/information or insights into the why of this behavior are very welcome as well :)
